TITLE: 2000 ford mustang gt coupe - 5 speed
ATTR: cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: rwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 138700#paint color: silver#title status: clean#transmission: manual#type: coupe
MESSAGE: for sale is my 2000 ford mustang gt coupe. for the sake of clarity; this car is not perfect. it starts reliably every time and has never let me down; but it needs a few things. this is my second car and i rarely drive it anymore. i love it and have a lot of great memories with it; but id rather see it go to someone else who will enjoy it than see it sit and deteriorate.#about the car:#the good:#- ive owned it since 2012 and put on about 40k miles in that time#- 138;700ish miles at the time of posting. probably wont change much since i rarely drive it#- clean title#- new engine put in by previous owner#- passed smog easily in august#- a/c and heat both work perfectly#- upgraded stereo with bluetooth#- 17 cobra wheels#- magnaflow catback exhaust#- air raid cold air intake (carb legal)#- short throw shifter#the not so good:#- paint is starting to fade. its mostly on the drivers side and looks to be a clear coat issue so it may buff out. driver side door is the worst (see pictures)#- car is originally from new york; so it has some surface rust. this is most apparent over the passenger rear wheel where it is starting to bubble (see pictures)#- driver seat is torn (see pictures)#- will need tires soon (comes with one very lightly used replacement rs3-a to match whats on the car; one tire on the car is fairly new)#- brakes need to be bled. pads look good#- abs light is on due to a bad abs module meaning the car currently does not have abs or traction control (from what i understand replacing the module is fairly easy; i just never got around to it)#- steering is loose. most likely needs a suspension/bushing refresh#- reverse gear grinds. it always goes into gear; you just have to be gentle sometimes#like i said - the car is not perfect; but it has never left me stranded. it always starts and always gets me from a to b. this would be a great running project or a great starter car for someone who wants to get into the mustang world.#feel free to call/text/email if you have any questions

TITLE: rare 2007 ford mustang gt/cs california special
ATTR: fuel: gas#title status: clean#transmission: manual
MESSAGE: 2007 mustang gt california special#back in 1968; an influential group of west coast dealers convinced ford to produce a limited-production mustang with unique styling cues borrowed from shelby mustangs. called the california special; it was built with help from shelby and sold exclusively in the western united states; to the tune of approximately 4;100 units.#flash forward 39 years to a new mustang platform with design ties to that original 68 version; throw in a revived relationship with shelby; and you have the 2007 mustang gt / california special. eagle-eyed spotters will notice a resemblance between the cal special and the 2007-2008 shelby gt; as both cars actually began life as a mustang gt premium outfitted with the california special package 54c. shelby nabbed the cal specials unique front and rear fascia; leaving the side scoops; rolled exhaust tips; black gt/cs exterior striping and two-tone interior accents exclusive to the california special. fords premium 18-inch polished wheels officially rounded out the gt/cs package.#since the california special package was only available on the mustang gt premium coupe or convertible; standard equipment included leather seats; a shaker 500 audio system; power everything; and of course the gts 300-horsepower 4.6 liter v-8; bolted to a five-speed manual transmission. common options included a five-speed automatic transmission; shaker 1000 audio system; satellite radio and heated seats. another very common addition to the gt/cs was the mustang gt appearance package; which added a hood scoop and an engine cover. only five colors were available: redfire metallic; performance white; vista blue metallic; ebony (black); and grabber orange. and though the cal specials interior was two-tone; at least one of those tones was black.#the modern california special offered enthusiasts a unique mustang edition slotted perfectly between the mustang gt premium and the shelby gt. with great looks and an unmistakable design presence; the 2007 mustang gt/cs is already considered a collectible in the motoring community. - see more at: http://racingedu.ford.com/enthusiasts/collector-vehicles/mustang/gtcs-2007/sthash.iq4oovm0.dpuf#engine#type: 90-degree sohc 24-valve v-8#displacement: 4.6l / 281 cid#horsepower: 300 hp @ 5;750 rpm#torque: 320 lbs.-ft. @ 4;500 rpm#bore x stroke: 90.2mm x 90mm#compression: 9.8:1#suspension#front: reverse-l independent macpherson strut; 34-mm stabilizer bar#rear: 3-link solid axle with coil springs; panard rod; 20-mm stabilizer bar#brakes#front: 12.4 in. vented disc; dual-piston caliper#rear: 11.8 in. vented disc; single-piston caliper#abs: four-channel abs system; linked to all-speed traction control#performance#0 to 60 mph: 5.1 seconds (car and driver)#60 to 0 braking: 130 feet (est.)#1/4-mile @ mph: 13.8 seconds @ 103 mph (car & driver)#production#total produced: 8;519#total coupe produced: 5;918#- black: 2;232#197;xxx miles and runs like new. staggered 20 foose custom rims. hagerty values at $10;800 with mileage included.

MESSAGE: with the arrival of the 2015 mustang; ford has successfully reinvented an icon. after 50 years of production; americas venerated ponycar has been revamped for modern times to raise the stakes among rivals like the chevrolet camaro and dodge challenger. gone is the archaic live rear axle; replaced by an all-new independent rear suspension and interior amenities fit for a premium car. and while some will scoff; the 2015 ford mustang is available with a turbocharged 4-cylinder engine in addition to the standard v6 or the gts growling v8. yet for all its updating; the mustang coupe and convertible retain the power; value and dashing driving manners that have fostered 9-million-plus sales over half a century and countless more fans.#text#show contact info#for a test drive.

TITLE: 1995 5.0 mustang convertible gt - limited edition andretti
ATTR: condition: good#cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: rwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 118000#paint color: red#title status: clean#transmission: manual#type: convertible
MESSAGE: 1995 mustang gt convertible; limited edition; includes cobra ignition and exhaust.#moving must sell $5500 obo#single owner for 20 years; man 5sp; 118k mi; always garaged.  recently services; runs excellent; body good#includes picture autographed by mario andretti#this was a texaco promotional give-a-way car in 1995. the game sponsored by texaco was called horsepower.   when you bought gas from a texaco gas station they would give you a scratch off card and you would have to match the front and back in order to win the car. there was the potential for 50 winners.  the cars were distributed across the us at one dealer in each state they were won.  mustang monthly magazine ran a small article in 1995 about this car and in the article texaco claims they gave away 44 of them; but the original purchase order where texaco ordered these cars is for 22 of them; so it appears that the number actually made is significantly less.  the car was shipped to a dealer in california and a rollout custom job was done and then hotshot across the country to the nearest dealer to the winner. basically; they did the stripping. red mag wheels; and air scoops on the side quarter fender vents. this was the only year that texaco and mario andretti did this promotion...so these are the only ones out there.

MESSAGE: i am a former ford employee; and special ordered my mustang gt in 2004 when the redesigned 2005 was just released. i ordered the premium package; with upgraded leather seats; dash; leather door inserts; my color instrument cluster (can change color of cluster display) and shaker 500 stereo that still cranks. it was a long 3 month wait for the car to be built; and delivered. this car has been my baby for 12 years; but it is time to let it go. as the original owner i have only put 88;000 miles on the car in 12 years (see odometer in photos). i have kept the mustang mostly stock; and have always been a pretty mellow driver. that said i do get into the throttle once in a while to keep things healthy... you could say im a bit of a neat freak/ocd type; and have kept the car in very good condition over the years. there has always been a sun shade the windshield; and i even keep the rear seats covered from the sun (see pictures). it would be hard to find a cleaner interior on an 05. i even still have the original factory floor mats! i also still have the original owners manual; and window sticker in the glove box. the 4.6l engine runs as strong as the day i bought the car; and the 5-speed manual shifts smooth. the car currently has 08 era shelby gt 500 18 staggered size wheels; and i still have the factory 17 wheels (see pictures) and you get them all. i also have a ford factory custom fit car cover; 2 spare ignition coils and a spare throttle body assembly (none of those parts have ever needed replacement). as a former auto tech i have done almost all of the routine maintenance myself. i only use ford factory; or ford motorcraft parts; even for basic things like battery replacement and oil filters (see photos). i also have run castrol gtx full synthetic oil since the car was new; and yes i prefer it over mobil1. the car does have some beauty marks on the exterior; but is overall very clean for the age. the gt 500 wheels currently on the car need new tires; and you can decide to run with the those wheels; or switch back to the factory ones. the a/c still blows nice and cold; radio; power locks; windows; power drivers seat etc. all still work great. the car has never needed any major repairs. i am asking $10;500 o.b.o. due to the low miles (one owner) and condition of car; as well as the included extras. these gts can go well over 100k miles; even when driven hard. please contact me if you are seriously interested; or have any other questions. this car to me is like the dog that i want to find a good home for; and a great find for someone looking to build up an 05 classic or to enjoy the way it is!

TITLE: 2005 mustang gt premium (project car)
ATTR: condition: good#cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: rwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 125000#paint color: red#title status: clean#transmission: manual
MESSAGE: ill start off by saying that this is now a project car. i bought the car 100% oem three years ago; and since then it has served me well. ive performed regular maintenance; tastefully modified almost everything; waxed it and washed it; taken care of it the best i was able to. ive listed the parts that are on the car below; as well as the parts not on it that i would include.#here is the project part of the car. earlier this year; on a regular drive home from school; the car stalled at a stoplight; and would no longer hold an idle; throwing a cam sensor code for the drivers bank. in short; i took the car to two shops and two dealerships; none of them could find the problem. i decided to take a look myself; and after pulling the drivers side valve cover; i found the vct had impacted the cam sensor and destroyed itself; along with the keyway between the timing chain sprocket and the cam. skipping over more details here; i took it back to a shop to get a compression test done; the car has good compression; but the drivers side head is cracked; and the timing chain has definitely jumped a few links. to get the car running; it would require more time and money than i have available as im a full time student.#this car would make an excellent starting point for someone who already has an engine; or already has the tools and time to fix the current motor. the good stuff on the car is as follows:#performance:#new alternator#new aftermarket vct timing chain sprockets#new oem clutch with less than 20k miles#sct x4 tuner (included)#jlt cai#stock intake (for smog)#o/r h pipe#spintech super pro street mufflers#oem downpipes with cats (for smog)#eibach multi-pro r1 coilovers#-extremely stiff front springs (450lb/ft?) intended for an iron block that never went in. this car will not understeer; ive tried#mm caster/camber plates#new a arms w. ball joints#lower mileage (50k) diff with 4.10s#rear eibach sway bar#steeda lcas#stoptech rotors and pads#mgw short throw shifter with custom delrin knob (doesnt get hot easily)#18 x 10.5 fr500s with 285s square (albeit low tread life)#appearance:#shorter cervinis style chin splitter#oem gt pedestal spoiler (not mounted)#roush ducktail spoiler complete (not mounted)#saleen 9 bar grille#oem gt grille with fog lights (not mounted)#2012 gt500 heat extractor mounted in-hood#pioneer p3100dvd; capable of bluetooth#mach 500 oem head unit#premium package so leather interior; power seats; windows; mirrors; etc#everything on the car has worked like a dream since i bought it. i have more pictures and videos of the car running if youd like them. it was mean as hell when it ran; and cornered like it was on rails. im in no rush to sell; so im starting at $7000 but shoot me any offers. i respond to text faster than email. thanks!

MESSAGE: well...here it is. the day every young boy dreads and every man knows is for the best. im selling my girl; scarlett; a 2002 mustang gt 5-speed manual. ive moved on to bigger and better things both geographically and materially and i dont have time to keep up with her. looking for a good home that will take care of her and treat her like the lady she is.#the good: low mileage on the car; under 90k miles. i cant find any rust on the body panels. the paint is pretty good; needs a little tlc to get her back to show room condition. lots of mods including:#bassani x-pipe#borla side exhaust#short-throw shifter#3:73 rear gear#diablosport tuner#edelbrock victor jr intake#edelbrock fuel rails#edelbrock fuel rail adapter#wilson manifolds elbow#wilson manifolds 90mm throttle body#cold air induction#cobra r front spoiler#cobra r hood#cobra r rear wing w/carbon fiber winglets#front cobra rotors and brakes#staggered 18in black chrome wheels#mickey thompson 305 drag radials in the rear#mach 1 running pony grill#smoked headlights#custom leather interior with swede inserts#the bad:#not running! must bring a trailer or a tow truck. the gas tank is in the driveway because the fuel pump went out#also need to add a couple fuel hoses up front#re-route the throttle cable#the interior needs to be put back together; i have all the seats for you#front bumper paint peeling off. its in the pictures; not trying to pull a fast one#i had it running last summer after putting on new cobra brakes; drove around the block and the fuel pump went out. need to adapt the fuel system to get return-style on the edlebrock rails.#if its so easy why arent i doing it? because im done. ive moved on. i live in miami.#i have a built 5.4l motor (forged crank; forged connecting rods; forged pistons; arp bolts; turbo cams; ported/polished 2v svo heads) i was going to put in the car to turn it into a drag car but i gave up on the project after seeing how much more money i needed to pour into it. if youre interested; you can take the car with the stock motor and the built 5.4l with you for a few extra bucks.#title in hand. looking to make this happen asap. but; if the offers are painfully low i have no problem shipping this up to the summer house.

MESSAGE: have for sale my 2012 mustang gt 5.0 premium. 2nd owner; bough with 4k miles. car is in near excellent condition; minor scratch on trunk lid and scratches on wheels. love this car but have a kid now and in the process of buying a house so hes gotta go. car is really strong and runs perfect; straight steering wheel and no pulling. ive changed the oil every 3k to 4k miles without ever missing one. use full synthetic motorcraf oil and filter. replaced spark plugs and all fluids at 50k; changed out trans fluid again at 75k. never used anything but ford parts. i am fully certified ford tech and have done all the work myself. only thing that has ever failed on me was the a/c compressor clutch at 55k. does also have a small amount of oil leaking from rear axle vent; overfilled it when i serviced it but just never had time to take some out again. engine bay dusty from just sitting here; but will clean inside and out upon delivery. comes with 15 subwoofer and amp. i do have all of the stock parts removed that go along with it. and i have a set of long tube headers and 3h-pipe i never got to install.#upgrades:#-eibach 1 front and 2rear lowering springs#-borla axle back exhaust#-cat and o2 deleats#-cobra jet intake manifold#-ford racing monoblade throttle body.#-custom built cold air intake#-aed tuned#any other questions feel free to ask.

TITLE: -- 2001 mustang gt convertible! great shape  only needs thread repair
ATTR: condition: good#cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: rwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 141362#paint color: custom#title status: clean#transmission: manual#type: convertible
MESSAGE: hello;#after the last three very long frustrating nights; i have decided to sell my love. i have invested an arm and a leg into her spending over $1500 in just the last 18 months including new tires; brake job ; new windshield; new a/c compressor; and much more (have records for all maintenance) and over the last 7 years i have never been let down; but i recently attempted to replace the spark plugs a little early and made a big mistake...#while attempting to change out the second to last spark plug; the cylinder 2 hole thread got stripped. so in the last two weeks       p i have had 4 different professional automotive shops tell me how much it would cost to repair the thread hole i accidentally stripped. as far as the problem with it; they all told me what was i thought to be correct - cylinder number 2 thread hole for the spark plug got stripped.#now for the repair; i was told essentially the same thing from all four places except one said to me honestly you should just get a thread tapping kit at autozone and fix it yourself for $30. i took that route but after several frustrating nights; i still havent been able to do this thread tapping correctly and since i have spent more than $1500 in parts just over the last 18 months such as new tires ; new windshield; brakes; new a/c compressor ; belts; and much more which has emptied my pockets and savings.#if it cant be simply repaired by thread tapping it doing it the correct way; worst case scenario the left block would be replaced and out of the four automotive shops; the highest price i was it would cost was $150-175 for the parts (left block head) and $350 for labor. that would bring the total to $500 even. i have put my heart and soul into this car and truly love her; but i just cant afford anything else so i have been driving my girlfriends car and motorcycle ever since this incident.#i have decided to sell my pride and joy to another mustang or muscle car enthusiast that would highly benefit from this who has the money to fix the problem. it kills me knowing the fact that had i just waited another 5-7 months and got the spark plugs replaced when it was the time to -- and at the same automotive shop she has received her beauty treatments at the last 7 years -- i could have either kept my baby or sold this car for $4;500 just less than two weeks ago; but considering the fact it is not drivable at the moment; i have no other option but to sell because i am out of spending $.#please dont low-ball me. i have spent so much time and money into her to ensure that i had a strong running car that was never questionable when it came to reliablility over the last 7 years. however; due to the current status of the vehicle i am willing to accept as low as $2150.#if you have any questions you may reach me at#show contact info#thank you.#will post more pictures very soon

TITLE: used 2003 ford mustang gt premium
ATTR: condition: fair#cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: rwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 185000#paint color: black#title status: clean#transmission: automatic#type: coupe
MESSAGE: for sale is my 2003 mustang gt premium with 185000 miles. the vehicle was recently in a small single car accident that caused some body damage to the drivers side door and drivers side front quarter panel; blew the front right tire; knocked the steering wheel out of alignment; and bumped the transmission. the transmission still works without a problem; but it does not lock into reverse; it must be held there while backing up. the engine and frame are undamaged and the car starts and runs great. the blown tire was replaced but does not match the other front tire.#the head lights and tail lights are new; the car has added sequential turn signals; an added bluetooth stereo; upgraded side speakers; and almost new rear tires. the interior is in overall very good shape; the seats are leather and are not torn; the carpet is in good shape; and the gauges all work. ac does not work; but heat does. cruise control and overdrive both work. working power mirrors and windows. spare tire and jack included.#with bit of work; this mustang can pretty easily be made to drive good as new. in the year i have owned it; i have had no reliability problems with the vehicle. please text me if interested!

MESSAGE: well cared for 2011 mustang gt with the track pack - brembo brakes; spare tire delete; larger front and rear sway bars; and struts; special engine and traction control programing;#upgrades include off road h-pipe; (factory carts are included); k&n filter charger;#computer tuning;#steeda sway bars and suspension.#first of all the car is a monster! its very fast and almost scary to drive... there will be no test drives with out cash in hand. will be happy to take you for a ride if you are a serious buyer.#the car runs and drives great; it needs nothing; i just changed the oil with mobile 1; new rear brakes and rotors; front brakes are almost new and the tires are good; about 50%#i have purchased a spare tire and tools that go with the car; it still has the compressor and styrofoam block in it now.#i bought the car originally thinking i was going to use the drive train in a 1966 f100 hot-rod im building (the car had a minor front end collision) once i bought the car and looked it over there was no way i could part it out; the damage was too minor; so i fixed it.#i bought another gt the same color hit in the rear and replaced the hood; fenders; bumper cover; and radiator support. nothing was painted. the bumper rebar (steel reinforcement/frame) was not touched! TITLE: modified 2006 ford mustang gt conv.
ATTR: cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: rwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 92000#paint color: grey#title status: clean#transmission: manual
MESSAGE: asking $13;000 or best offer. car is currently in atlanta this summer.#up for sale is a 2006 ford mustang gt convertible equipped with a 4.6l v8; a 5-speed manual transmission; and a 3.55 rear differential. there is a factory shaker 1000 sound system included; and red leather door panels and red leather seats (driver seat has experienced some usual wear; but is in good shape; rear seats are perfect). the gauge cluster has the mycolor system as well. there is a spare tire in the back; and the convertible roof is in good condition.#it currently has about 92;000 miles; but it is my daily driver so the mileage will increase. the front tires are relatively new; and the rears have a little more than a half life of tread. oil has been changed every 5;000 miles. transmission fluid changed at 70;000 miles; and the differential fluid has been changed at 80;000 miles. the rear passenger-side lower control arm was replaced at around 68;000 miles at a ford dealership; and the water pump was replaced around 80;000 miles at a ford dealership (cannot remember the exact mileage for either). also the rear brake calipers were replaced last year at about 75;000 miles at a ford dealership. other than that; the motor and drivetrain have held up well.#modifications include jba longtube headers; jlt series 3 air intake; an h-pipe with high-flow catalytic converters; muffler deletes; quad tip exhaust; eibach lowering springs; rtr adjustable panhard bar; hid headlamps; kenwood stereo (apple and bluetooth connectivity); @101blur aluminum rear wing; gen 6 tail lamps; and a saleen/parnelli jones rear end conversion.#with all of the bolt-ons mentioned and using 93 octane fuel; it should produce about 310 hp to the rear wheels (guessing 370 hp at the motor). the exhaust setup is extremely loud; however i will throw in a pair of flowmaster delta 40s in case it is too loud for you.

TITLE: 2005 mustang gt mint condition in every way and low miles
ATTR: VIN: 1ZVFT82H355210621#condition: like new#cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: rwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 123241#paint color: red#size: full-size#title status: clean#transmission: automatic
MESSAGE: this car is as clean as they come.  pristine condition.  always covered or in a garage.  great tires.  super clean interior.  of course the sound of this awesome v8 brings a smile to my face every time i hit that key.  300 horse power and 320 foot lbs of torque and this baby will get with it and still rated at 23 miles per gallon highway!  excellent mileage for a 2005 model.  only 10k miles per year which is way below average.  motortrend magazine did a very nice article on the car http://www.motortrend.com/cars/ford/mustang/2005/2005-ford-mustang-gt/#a quantum improvement is noticeable from 10 feet away; and its not just the fab retro/modern styling. all the panel gaps; surface alignment; and detailing on these salable early production cars look japan tight and orderly. interior craftsmanship is similarly first-rate; with real aluminum on the steering wheel and dash (on cars with the optional appearance package) and a chic; woven headliner.#a higher beltline and narrower windows conspire with a proper bucket seat and heel-n-toe pedals to make the new mustang cockpit feel sportier; though the car stands an inch taller and the seat is a half-inch higher off the ground. shorter folks may find themselves banging their funny bone into the console lid while shifting the short stick; which was moved aft this year. everyone will notice the dead pedal is tipped forward at an awkward angle that doesnt match that of the accelerator. the rear seat accommodates sub-six-footers reasonably well; but theyll have to hold their own lattes-ford neglected to mold a pair of cupholders into the back of the center console.

MESSAGE: up for sale is my 1996 mustang cobra. the car has a clear title in my name. the car does not have a motor and will be sold as a roller. the chassis has 92624 miles. the body was sprayed in a flat black 9 years ago when i was young and dumb and plastidip was not a thing yet. it was originally crystal white with black and tan interior. the car has an authentic saleen s281 spoiler that has been on the car since 98 and was also signed on the passenger airbag cover by steve saleen. this car has no rust except for some surface rust seen on the rear end(it was a wa state car most of its life; spent 4 years in tx before coming to ga. the car has kenny brown extreme matrix subframe reinforcements. it has 4 cylinder fox springs on the front and eibach pro springs on the rear. it is currently sitting on weld 15in skinny and spare tires as the rear welds were stolen from my storage unit. the car was involved in one minor accident with a dear that required a new passenger front fender; and headlight back in 2006. there body is very clean(minus the paint obviously). this car would be perfect for someone looking to build a race car or chump/lemons car(this was my plan but time and other priorities are preventing that). stuff that will be included will be a teksid block with good crosshatching that could be cleaned up to stock bore size; a set of manley rods and pistons out of an 03-04 cobra with brand new wristpins included; a set of forged cp racing big bore flatop n/a pistons; ford racing aluminum driveshaft; 1 fully rebuilt and assembled 03-04 head; the second head was used for port development work and would need to be reassembled but everything is there; all the timing; front cover accessories; 96 cobra forged crank; a vortech 4v blower bracket; less than 40k mile t45 with steeda shifter; mach 1 intake manifold that has been ported(might need some minor cleanup work) with lid; and a bunch more that i am probably forgetting about. i could part all this out for way more than my asking price but i need the space and would rather see this car go to someone that will put it back on the road or track sometime soon. let me know if you have any more questions. asking $2000 obo#svt; TITLE: 2008 ford mustang gt
ATTR: VIN: 1ZVHT82HX85157056#condition: like new#cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: rwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 41500#paint color: black#size: mid-size#title status: clean#transmission: manual#type: coupe
MESSAGE: magnuson magnacharger; 462 rw hp; 5 spd; performance clutch; numerous upgrades!#the great thing about the ford mustang is that its always been easy to turn it into exactly the car you want. this 2008 ford mustang gt delivers supercar levels of performance thanks to a supercharged v8; yet retains all the comfort and convenience items we demand today; all wrapped in one of the most attractive packages in recent years.#the mustang gt is a popular car because it delivers awesome v8 power at a reasonable price; and this cool gt takes that concept and turns it up to 11. more power; more style; more comfort; more; well; everything; is standard equipment here. dressed in black; it certainly looks the part of a predator; and the finish quality is quite good; matching the newer paint with the oem stuff in a seamless way. yes; theres plenty of recent black paint; which was necessary due to the extensive body mods; including the front air dam; hood; and deck lid spoiler; all of which give this mustang a hyper-aggressive look. dealer-installed boss decals emulate the 1970 boss 302 performance look; along with traditional details like the hood pins and auxiliary driving lights in the center of the grille. you also get scoops on the c-pillar and quarter panels; emulating the shelby mustangs of the 60s; making for one of the best-looking late-model mustangs weve seen in quite a while.#the boss theme continues inside; and with the upgrades here you know this wasnt a cut-rate build. the two-tone leather seats look good with only very minor wear thats commensurate with its age and mileage; another sign that this car has led a pretty easy life. the gauges and steering wheel are stock; but when things look this good theres really no need for upgrades. there is; however; a big hurst cue ball knob and high-performance shifter in the center console managing a 5-speed manual transmission; suggesting that the guy who built this car was serious about getting things right. the a/c is cold; the am/fm/cd stereo sounds great; and its loaded with features like a tilt wheel; power windows and locks; and cruise control. in back; the trunk is virtually untouched; including the spare tire neatly stowed under the floor.#theres big horsepower under the domed hood; complements of a magnuson twin-screw magnacharger sitting on top of the engine. working in conjunction with a set of comp camps mutha thumpa camshafts; 38 lb-hr fuel injectors; an oversized 98mm maf sensor; and a custom computer programmer; this 4.6 liter v8 is considerably more powerful than stock. however; all that added power doesnt seem to come with a down-side; because it starts easily; idles well; doesnt get fussy in traffic; and pulls like a freight train when you have room to really open it up. workmanship is excellent throughout; with oem levels of fit and finish on the hardware and service access is still decent despite the added equipment. the 5-speed manual gearbox doesnt seem to mind the added power thanks to an aluminum flywheel and ram 600 clutch; and with 4.10 gears out back; it launches like a slingshot. the exhaust is upgraded with a set of flo pro max mufflers that sound spectacular and youll be shocked by just how clean this car is underneath. 20-inch foose wheels add some sparkle to the all-black boss and carry 255/40/20 toyo performance radials.#with just 41;500 original miles; the original window sticker; maintenance records; and even a dyno sheet; this mustang is a stunning performance bargain that couldnt be duplicated for the asking price of $24;500 cash.

MESSAGE: 21;000 original miles; 4.6 liter engine - allen engine development twin screw eaton m-90 supercharger with intercooler - 5 speed transmission - 3.55 gears - bassani off-road x-pipe - borla stinger exhaust - camber plates - h&r super sport springs - saleen wheels - newer tires - cruise control - power windows and power drivers seat - cold air conditioning - mach stereo system with 6 d changer & amplifiers - website: saleenautomotive.com - its a show winner!#dont buy this vehicle if you dont enjoy visiting with people. they will come up to you at service stations; restaurants and even on the street with compliments about how beautiful the saleen is; how great it sounds or wanting to know more about it.  it definitely stands out in a crowd!#i bought the car 2 months ago to drive on the 2017 hot rod power tour and now that the tour is finished the car is being offered for sale.  i have driven the car just over 4;000 miles and it has performed perfectly. oil level is still on full and the oil looks clean!  i have a carfax report to show the miles are correct and that it was involved in an accident in 2010 which resulted in a salvage title. the vehicle was restored and has been driven about 11;000 miles since then. the saleen drives like a dream and the allen supercharger makes it pull amazingly strong.  the engine puts out about 425 hp (380 hp at the rear wheels) according to the prior owner.  it will set you back in the seat; but still get between 21 and 23 mpg on the highway! only 202 of these vehicles were built in 2002 and this may be one of the best preserved of those models made!  the interior is near perfect; tires have less than 5;000 miles on them and the car is ready to go as far as you wish to drive it.  the car is 15 years old; but looks and drives like it is new!  the cars sold new between for between $33;000 (stock) and $40;000 (supercharged). this car was custom built by mustang hall of fame member steve saleen. this is a chance to own a car that is better than new.  it is ready for car shows; cruising; road courses or the drag strip.  it has been adult owned since new and very well cared for.#more pictures are available upon request or view on my facebook page: facebook.com/dave.rose.7374

TITLE: 2012 mustang gt 5.0
ATTR: condition: excellent#cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: rwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 23400#paint color: black#title status: lien#transmission: manual
MESSAGE: up for sale is my 2012 5.0. its a premium model. not a trac pack model. heated leather seats. black interior. shaker sound system but no navigation ( i didnt want it). it is a 6 speed manual. color changing gauges. bluetooth with sync. i am the second owner of the car. bought it from an older retired man who i am still in contact with. currently 23;400 miles on it. wont go up much at all since its not my daily driver. i dont owe much on this car but im not willing to settle for too low of offers. if thats the case id rather pay it off and keep it. i do not need to sell it and it wont bother me if it doesnt. figure out what it would cost you to buy a stock one and add the same stuff i have. tires alone without wheels were $1;700. borla; if you know about them; it is not cheap stuff. $1;600 for this exhaust for parts alone. so before you make too low an offer come and see and hear it. on to the modifications since i know youre wondering what i have done to it. i still have all receipts for parts in a folder from previous owner as well as mine from what i have done.#-airaid cold air intake with resonator delete.#-borla s type catback exhaust with x-pipe ( sounds amazing ).#-hurst short throw shifter.#-ford racing 3.73s gears.#-michelin pilot super sport tires all the way around. 295/35r19 in the rear and 255/40r19 up front.#-american muscle charcoal grey wheels. 4 19x8.5 and 2 19x10. wasnt staggered til i bought it.#-bama performance hand held tuner.#-tint kits from american muscle on tail lights and fog lights. plasti dipped all emblems to give it the blackout look.#-huskey floor liners.#i still have all the stock parts for this car and will be included. wheels and tires; gears; even the factory catback exhaust. im sure i have forgotten somethings but cant think of them right now. now you are probably wonder if ive raced it. hell yes i have! act like you wont. she ran 13.3 without launching it at bandimere on ford day last summer. hell its never seen a burnout let alone a launch. i can only imagine what it would run on some warmed up drag radials. other than the few times shes been down the 1/4 mile it gets driven like miss daisy. i have plenty of coworkers and friends that can verify that if you care to know. as i said before i still owe on it. so if you are interested the transaction will need to be done at my credit union. again; i do not need to sell it. just testing the waters. text is best. if you call and i dont answer leave a message.#show contact info#thanks for looking.

TITLE: 2007 ford mustang (upgraded)
ATTR: condition: excellent#fuel: gas#odometer: 92000#paint color: blue#title status: clean#transmission: automatic#type: coupe
MESSAGE: let the car talk commence!#this mustang still has a whole lot of life left in it -- as it is nearing 100;000 miles i took it upon myself to do the next owner a favor and here is the massive list of items that have been swapped and replaced for fresh parts. (please see below)#1) the 05-09 mustangs recently had a recall to replace the front end airbags. the car was brought to the dealer days ago for that replacement.#2) these items were purchased and replaced july; 2017 -- adding: performance duralo brake pads and rotors. (the rotors are slotted and grooved to dissipate heat; while also being zinc coated for a non-rust rotor.)#3) knowing that the bores on the caliper brackets usually go bad on mustangs around 100k miles i replaced the brackets (the slides are back to their youthful state and move insanely fast allowing for instantaneous braking power! you are welcome).#4) when manufactured the mustangs are given poor quality harmonic balancers. at 91k miles i replaced the harmonic balancer/dampener with a new performance balancer/dampener.#5) in the process of replacing the balancer i also swapped out the cam/crank shaft sensor (the sensor will measure proper oscillation from the dampener as it rotates).#6) a new heavy-duty serpentine belt was added at 91k miles.#7) the tires were replaced at 86k miles and are in excellent condition.#8) the cabin air filter and intake air filter by k&n are recent replacements at 91k miles.#9) the oil and oil filter has and always will be changed every 3;000 miles. last change was at 91k miles.#10) also; while changing the balancer/dampener i drained the coolent and had that replaced and also drained and replaced the power steering fluid.#there are plenty of other repairs that have taken place. serious buyers only. if you have other questions about the vehicle please e-mail me and i will respond within the same day. if you prefer to speak over the phone e-mail me your number and i will give you a call. thanks and safe driving!

TITLE: 2003 ford mustang cobra (terminator)
ATTR: condition: excellent#cylinders: 8 cylinders#drive: rwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 80000#paint color: black#size: mid-size#title status: clean#transmission: manual#type: convertible
MESSAGE: for sale: 2003 cobra convertible.#reason for selling: would like a 4 door luxury performance car m3/5 etc..#car history:#i bought this car back in 2014 from a police officer in phoenix az and drove the car back to mn.#when i purchased the car it was just as it rolls off the factory floor; not a single mod. it however was a car with a platinum warranty from the az ford dealer and i have records for about any service possible; including new rear end; irs; clutch; drive safe; inter-cooler pumps; convertible top motor; window motors. etc about an couple inches of service records.#since i have been in ownership of the car i have put quite an extensive amount of time and money into modifications.#i know i will be missing some things; come and see the car and i assure you; it will be nearly impossible to leave without buying.#under the hood i started with a jlt gen ii cold air intake; and a 2.8 supercharger pulley that makes about 14lbs of boost consistently; and 90mm idler pulley with a gates green belt. i also upgraded the cooling system with an afco dual pass heat exhanger to help keep iats down.  along with a brand new ford intercooler pump last month. ngk tr-6 spark plugs; i just got the car back from db performance who installed the cooling upgrades and along with a kenne bell bap to help bring more fuel to the engine; and they did a tune on the car too; i have the invoice for 2k of tuning and work.#i get compliments all the time telling me the car is the best sounding car in the area; it has a upr catless mid-pipe with polished borla stinger cat-back exhaust system that is sure to put a large smile on your face. the car still have the original t-56 tranny with an upgrade spec stage ii clutch that is easily drivable but grabs really hard.#have dyno sheets and paperwork for whomever may request it; please only if youre serious.#the car makes just shy of 500 hp/tq but rips down the road incredibly fast and is not a car for a rookie driver.#the car sits on a custom set of true forged three piece victory wheels;#with a mean brand new brake set up to match with all new pads rotors and even calipers in the rear.#up front is a 18x9 with good rubber#out back is 18x11 with toyo proxies 25mm spacer315/35/18#low profile irs bolts#extended wheel studs#exterior of the car has many mods as well and is murdered out entirely.#headlights; taillights; windows; all tinted between 20-5%#the engine is tuned on a sct x-4 the best tuner available for these cars; tuned by danny at db performance.#feel free to call and ask about the car.#inside the car you have a custom pillar by speed of sound that holds a plx multi gauge widband afr gauge.#and a aeroforce dual scan gauge which you can choose up to about 10 things youd like to monitor at once. top of the line.#along with a touch screen double din head unit with bluetooth and all the goodies.#inside the car you will find the matching suede seats to the top; in very good condition. this a 1/112 color combo.#many little unique interior pieces; shift bezel; cobra snake floor mats; couple other things you will notice when seeing the car in person.#the car is not perfect but in really good condition. i have a 3 year ceramic coated every year and detailed professionally often.#i have almost all the stock parts to go with the car besides wheels but i do have another set of aftermarket wheels (xxr) we could negotiate into the deal to lower price as well.#i will entertain trades but would like to go up in value. text my personal phone if you have any questions or interest.#show contact info#please save my time and yours and truly only contact me with serious interest.#thank you for taking the time to read through this long posting; good day.

MESSAGE: midlife crisis must come to an end; so this great car now available.  life is dragging me back to reality and need to repair our suv.#legend lime was only available for 2005 and 2006.  sharp and clean v6 premium 2006 mustang.  no known mechanical issues (none expected either).  no warning lights and see the picture with all dash lights when starting (no  disabled lights).  well taken care of.  a/c; heat; cruise; power windows; power mirrors; power locks; power driver seat; 6 disk shaker 500.  no leaks; no strange or ugly noises from the engine.  drives great.  clean interior.  no rips or tears.  all buttons work.   i did not clean the engine so you can see it is not leaking.  clear title.  original wheels with winter tires approx 70%.  also custom black wheels with 50% tread for summer.  quite often i get smiles and thumbs up from a wide variety of people.   if you dont want to be noticed; dont buy this one.#one of your questions....yes; the bra is hiding something.  crack on the front bumper.  it is repaired but looks ugly.  the rear bumper has a few dents as well.  passenger mirror housing is cracked.  and the last item is the scrape behind the drivers door.   these were all there when i bought it almost 2 years ago with plans of returning to my glorious young years and doing some body work. MESSAGE: for sale is my 2014 mustang gt.  it has a hellion twin turbo package with magnaflow street axle exhaust; both professionally installed; and when they put it on the dyno it registered 563.82 hp and 510.95 torque.  do the math and 563 at the wheels calculates out to over 600 hp at the crank.  i have the dyno sheet and all the receipts from the cars original owner - i am the second owner and i also have all the receipts for everything ive done to it.  the car was over $43;000 new; the turbo package was $8500; and the install of the turbo package was $6;500.  i have all the receipts.  thats over $58;000 into this car.#the car has never seen salt.  as long as the weather is nice; the mileage will be increasing; i drive it; so please understand if the mileage shown here in the ad isnt current - as of today (6/12/2017) it is current.  if i update the mileage ill update the ad.  it is a sleeper - no doubt - nothing about it looks like a 600hp car unless you really know what youre looking for.  i run amsoil and nothing else in all my vehicles - thats what this car is running now and has been since the day i brought it home.  its fast.  its wicked fast.  if youre into that kind of thing...#no joy rides - and no test drives - please.  please understand - im just not comfortable letting a perfect stranger wander off and play with my 600 hp car if they never intend to buy it.  if you are a serious buyer i will take you for a ride and show you what it can do.  when you buy it; you play with it all you want :).  this car is too powerful and too fast for me to hand over the keys to someone who doesnt know what theyre doing and cant handle it if it gets away from them - or gets arrested and my car gets impounded - so i just cant take that chance.#i currently have a loan against the vehicle - as a part of the sale i will pay off the lien and give you the lien release - if you need that in writing thats not a problem.  im not out to screw anybody - i just dont have the funds laying around to pay off the loan - if i did...i wouldnt have a loan.#there is nothing wrong with this car - i just dont drive it enough to justify the car payment at this stage in my life - and the most expensive of the cool toys is always the first to go...#extras of interest include:#hellion twin turbo with tuner#magnaflow street axle exhaust#brembo brakes#recaro racing seats#shaker stereo#rear backup camera#please call; text; or e-mail with questions.  if you sound like a robot i wont respond.  if you e-mail ill get back to you within 24 hours.  if you text or call as long as im not driving; sleeping; or in a meeting - ill get back to you right away.#thanks for looking.

touchscreen infotainment system with optional navigation added; bluetooth; voice commands; remote start (which will cool off the car before you get in; a must in texas heat); power seats; heated and cooled seats; and many more comfort oriented upgrades. it also has the 50 year anniversary package which includes limited 50 year package 19 wheels; 50 year badging on - the rear of the car; dash; embossed on the leather seats; floor mats; and just about everywhere you look. it also includes contrast white leather stitching; and a unique front grill. this car is equipped with the fast shifting automatic gearbox with paddle shifters; stainless steel (this exhaust sounds great while accelerating; but doesnt drone on the highway. it keeps the catalytic converters so theres no issue with inspection. it will not rust because its stainless steel.)#i have kept all of the original parts that i have modified except for the stock exhaust. the warranty is still 100% intact because no tuning has been done to the ecu (although removing the intake restrictor and adding a tune would bump up the power considerably if youre so inclined).#if you are looking for a future classic you can drive today; MESSAGE: rebuilt title do not contact me asking if its clean!!#hey guys! today im presenting you with my 2008 mustang v6 this car has 52 thousand miles on it which is alot less then most mustangs will have at this time period. the car is in good running conditions and runs and drives and oh boy will you be surprised by how fast it goes! but since the car hit 52k miles a few of things are starting to die out due to age and while the car is in great driving conditions it misfires when the car starts from a cold start the misfire which last a few seconds then goes away for the rest of the ride it does slightly vibrate sometimes when idling in traffic but for the most part its good. and in trying to fix the misfire peoblem i replaced a few things and was able to narrow it down to the cops(coil on plug) which seem to go out around its age.#i done a few repairs to the car i will list below.#replaced the water pump at 49k miles#replaced spark plugs at 51k#replaced oil at 48500#replaced cooling fluid at 49k#cleaned maf at 50k#replaced 3qts of power steering fluid#now for the problems even though the car is at 52k it does have a few problems mostly cosmetic and only 1 really effects the driving experience#1. car misfires on a cold start (i explained it above already)#2. steering wheel squeaks when moves to the left this problem only happens when your turning very slowly from a complete stop the noise doesnt happen when you are turning with speed or moving the steering wheel with some speed. im pretty sure its the power steering fluid i changed out 3 qts and the problem went away somewhat.#3. the car has a few chips and such from the past owner in the back she has a small paint chip in the back bumper(someone reversed into it at a parking lot); crack in the paint of the front bumper and a crack in the paint on the passanger side fender he doesnt know how he got them but noticed them after coming home from work.#4. the belt squeaks so it needs replacing the belt is tight and gives no slack so the tensioner is good so its prob a belt issue and a simple replacing of it should fix the issue.#5. the hood doesnt always open when you pull the latch you will have to push down the hood sometimes as its raised up a bit and gets stuck somehow. possibly can get a mechanic too fix it or a new hood.#and thats all the issues with it so far so come check out the car if your interested!!#im a poor college student that got to drive 20 miles to school and 26 miles to work i need something more economical in gas and just nicer in general since i got to support myself over here i cant really let this go for low. so im just looking for 5700 obo 4900 is my firm price and i wont go lower then that unless you can add something to the deal...#will trade for. 05 infiniti g35 sedan or coupe(manual is what i want but if you have a clean auto im down); TITLE: 2003 ford mustang convertible - low mileage!!! 2 owner!! - must sell!!
ATTR: condition: good#cylinders: 6 cylinders#drive: rwd#fuel: gas#odometer: 52400#paint color: silver#size: sub-compact#title status: clean#transmission: automatic#type: convertible
MESSAGE: year:  2003#make: ford#model:  mustang#sub-model:  convertible#engine: v6#mileage:  52;400 on body - approximately 1;500 on engine#owners: 2 (i am 2nd owner of vehicle)#asking price:  $8;999 or best offer#the good stuff:#this car is completely custom.. i bought the vehicle used with only 1 previous owner and wanted to customize it.  i started adding performance parts for the v6 little by little and then i wanted a big boost so i added a custom super six motorsports v6 engine.  the engine alone puts it faster then a gt.. nevermind the regearing and all other mods. here is a quick list of the mods:#engine: ssm 4.3l w/ forged internals and stage 3 work (rated to handle in excess of 500hp); bbk 65mm throttle body; bbk cold air intake; roush side exhaust; cold fusion nitrous kit; aluminum driveshaft; mac lt headers; mac h-pipe; msd wires; regeared#exterior mods: optx led underbody and wheel well kit; streetglow blue led license plate frame; cervinis cobra r (95 styel) hood; roush stage 3 body kit; tinted taillights; tinted headlights; 8000k hid headlights and foglights; black saleen style rims; lambo door kit#interior mods: 3 custom switches on center console (1 controls for interior blue neon lights and 2 empty); control boxes for license plate frame and underbody/wheel well lights mounted in center console; 1 9inch streetglow blue neon tube by each passenger feet area; 1 6inch led light in center a/c vents; roush gauges; simco gauge pod on dash; autometer trans temp and a/f ratio gauges; 8 streetglow led singles mounted under each door; polished mustang door sills; custom nitrous switches in cup holder#audio/visual:  pioneer navigation headunit; 2 subwoofers in trunk; pioneer speakers in doors#there are probably more mods that i forgot but all i can think of off the top of my head..#the bad stuff:#i believe in being 100% honest when it comes to vehicles because i want the same in return.  the vehicle is a great car overall but like every car it has its flaws.  the only issue that the vehicle has is that if it is not started it will die out from sitting after a week.  i have done research online and found that this is a common problem with ford and has something to do with one of the control modules.  basically if i have it right something in the module does not tell the car to go to sleep and so electronics stay running and after some time the battery dies out.  i have installed a batter tender which i will include with the car.. by plugging this in it keeps the battery fully charged and you can leave the car sitting for extended periods of time.  other then that there are no real major flaws.#summary:#the car is a great car and definitely an eye catcher.  i get compliments everywhere i go.  unfortunately i have 2 other cars and several summer toys and this car just doesnt get the use that i planned on.  i recently had my first child and moving into our new home so the toys must go.  i have invested a lot of money in this car and while i understand that you dont get a huge return on items purchased i will not give the car away.  i would say that i easily have over 15k just in accessories.  the engine alone was 8k.   with that being said i am  looking to get $8;999 or best offer for the car.

MESSAGE: very rare and highly collectible one year only sn95 mustang is what it is and even more so in the factory condition that its in.#one of the cleanest you will find and its never been detailed it just a unique specimen kept in garage all of its life.#1995 ford mustang gt-stripper crystal white - zr ext./ black int. the one year only 1995 stripper are very collectible and harder to find please read the below explanation to value and appreciate. cars has 125;953 miles on it is been driven an average of about 5.700 miles per year as it is to be 22 years young at some-point this year. it has been always garage kept both down in florida and currently in pennsylvania. to no surprise it drives as good as it looks. never in an accident has all body panel numbers - has manual widows; trans and extremely cold a/c. fyi: production numbers for those asking is a total of 1995 gts coupe was 6;370. - 4;848 5-speeds (a total of only 847 white cars were sold and they dont list they interior breakdown anywhere) and 1;522 automatics. gts. looks and drive like new all stock 5.0 liter ho push rod engine; the 5 speed trans shifts good... the car as the warmer dry weather come in will be back on the road if still up for sale at some point in may/june. sorry no trades cash in hand only#work done to car 3.73 gear set added to its 8.8 rear; stock suspension with kybs all around; 1 5/8 fps shorty headers; bassani cat x pipe; flow master 2 1/2 american thunder cat back with stainless tips; new michelin 235/60r16 tires; american muscle chin spoiler install out front and previous owner spent good money on aftermarket stereo system. as in all used parts and vehicles deals they are final and sold as is. think spring and sunny days - thanks for looking.#note: again i state it will be first come first serve 100% cash and drive deal only! - no need calling to help with sale the car is a no-brainer and will sell it self to an educated buyer!!!#the car was acquired several years back and deliverer to me from florida; yes i took the ride down to see the car and had it delivered to me a short time later. its one of my favorite toy but it will need to find another warm home. the one year only 1995 stripper is very collectible and harder to find the good condition as the years pass and my car is in awesome like new condition it is way i added to my toys. so ive below tried to do a descent job in describing what someone may be interested in.#regards; ernie##a little ford history: what is the 1995 mustang gts?#a gts was added to the lineup for 1995. there were 6;370 produced--4;848 5-speeds and 1;522 automatics. gtss came standard with the basic equipment that made a mustang a gt. this included the 302cid push-rod v-8 power-plant; borg-warner t-5 manual transmission and a traction-lok axle. obvious external characteristics of a gts are the absence of a rear deck-lid spoiler; lack of fog lamps in the front air-dam; and 16x7 5 spoke sn-95 pony rims. factory original gtss will have the mustang gt logo embossed on the rear bumper cover; as is the case on standard gts; and mustang gt badging on the front fenders. dual 2.25 stainless steel tail pipes exit the back.#inside the passenger compartment; the gts mustang shared the same amenities as the base v-6 mustang. seats are cloth and 4-way power adjustable seats were only optional on the drivers side. windows and door locks were manual. only the driver and passenger side mirrors were powered. air conditioning and an am/fm stereo cassette player were standard. visor mirrors were non-illuminated; as opposed to illuminated like the gt and convertible mustangs. the instrument pod was the only interior amenity borrowed from the gt; and it included a 7000 rpm red-line tach; 150 mph speedometer; fuel; volt; oil; and temp gauges.#as a side note; all options on v6 models were also available on the gts. these options are easily broken down into two categories. package group 1 consisted of power windows; door locks and remote decklid release; which was standard on gt and convertible. group 2 consisted of cruise control; dual illuminated visor mirrors (standard on gt and convertible); and an am/fm stereo cassette player with premium sound. four-wheel anti-lock brakes; an aode transmission; and remote key-less entry were also options. customers were able to order gtss from the factory with as little or as many options as they wanted. options were also available at the dealer; on request of the purchaser.#ford did away with the gts designation in 1996; with 1995 being the only year a true gts model existed; replacing it with the 248a option package which deleted many things from the car and made it comparable to the gts. this package continued to be offered until the end of the 1998 model year.#this is the last year for the venerable 5.0l 302 cid v8; marking the end of mustangs overhead-valve/push-rod-engine era.#note: do not contact me with unsolicited services or offers

TITLE: 1999  35th anniversary mustang

MESSAGE: a redesigned sn-95 mustang came on december 26; 1998 for the 1999 model year. characterizing the redesign was fords new edge design language; which featured sharper contours; larger wheel arches; and creases in the bodywork; replacing many of the soft lines of the previous model. the mustang also received new wheels and hubcaps. however; the car carried over the same roof line and interior; in addition to the same basic platform. all 1999 mustangs (except the cobra) received 35th-anniversary badges on the front fenders.#a 35th anniversary limited edition appearance option package came red; they featured a body-colored hood scoop; rear spoiler; side scoops and rocker panels; a blacked-out panel between the taillamps; and 15 y 8-inch (200 mm) five-spoke aluminum wheels; while the interiors white seats with silver inserts and pony logo; aluminum shift knob; a unique instrument cluster with 35th anniversary script.#the 3.8 l ohv essex v6 returned as the base engine for 1999. a new split-port induction system replaced single-port induction; which increased the base models output to 190 hp (142 kw; 193 ps) @ 5250 rpm and 220 lbft (298 nm) of torque @ 2750 rpm. in 2001; ford added intake manifold runner control (imrc) which further increased the engines output to 193 hp (144 kw; 196 ps) at 5500 rpm and 225 lbft (305 nm) of torque @ 2800 rpm. during the second half of the 2004 model year; the 3.8

MESSAGE: im selling my 2007 ford mustang gt coupe premium.#it is torch red exterior and crimson red leather interior.#car runs great; sounds great; needs nothing.#factory options:#- 18 polished aluminum wheels;#- leather dash panel;#- hood scoop;#- power & heated seats;#- 6 cd/mp3 shaker radio with aux in;#- engine cover and more...#the car is clean; mechanically sound and very well taken care of for last 7 years (im the second owner).#it is in excellent condition for a 100k mi car: you can find some random tiny bumps and scratches; but nothing major or noticeable. i am automotive engineer and a car guy; so i was always taking care of her properly. have all my service records (i do all maintenance myself; dont trust shops in general). full synthetic oil every 5k mi. all scheduled maintenance.#no engine or performance mods - powertrain is all stock.#i did overhaul the suspension 1.5 year ago because old shocks needed replacement; so i went all in:#- bilstein shocks all around - you cant get better than those;#- ford performance k springs (lowering 1). im not a big fan of lowering cars; but those are better springs and car does honestly look better this way;#- adjustable panhard bar to compensate for lowering;#- ford performance front strut mounts;#- poly bushings all around (sometimes little squeaky in winter; but totally worth having in summer);#- new front stabilizer links.#all in all; that made car way more neutral in turns; which is a good thing for tail-happy mustangs.#ride is slightly harsher than stock; but it is still fine even for a daily driver. amount of gained control is worth that little extra harshness.#battery; brake rotors; pads; front wheel hubs and spark plugs have been replaced within last 10k mi.#tires have about half thread.#im only selling her because i bought something faster and better; so she is just collecting dust in my garage and taking up space; which is a shame for this car.#please text or email only; no calls.

MESSAGE: if you want to be the only one on your block with turbos and a supercharger under the hood; then this is the car for you.  it has a compound boost setup that uses two turbochargers to feed the factory supercharger.  this delivers lots of power and the supercharger helps to provide instant boost.  it drives just like a stock vehicle until you hit the throttle.#price: $20;000 o.b.o#details:#- hellion hellraiser compound boost kit (twin 61mm turbos feeding the factory supercharger).#- the turbo waste gates regulate the total system boost pressure; and they are set to 20 psi.#- estimated 650 rwhp (hasnt been to the track or dynoed).#- aeromotive a1000 fuel pump with full an fuel system.#- stock mufflers with electronic cutouts allow you to go from very quiet to obnoxiously loud with the press of a button.#- ford mach 1000 stereo upgrade (available from factory as an option on mustang v6 and gt models; but not cobras).#- irs with a t2 torsen differential; ford racing diff cover; and the ftbr bushing kit.#- nitto nt555 extreme zr tires - p275/40zr17#issue:#- the paint is not perfect. the clear coat is flaking off on some areas of the hood and front fenders (see pics).#note: test drives will not be allowed.  i will drive and take people out if you look at it and are interested in this 2003 cobra convertible.  if you are not familiar with the feel of a 650 rwhp car and you choose to go for a ride; i suggest at a minimum of bringing a change in underwear........just a suggestion!

brakes and axle. the axle is the same that was put in the 2011 gt500: 3.73 posi.#i have owned many s197 mustang gts. i look for a really nice original car. i bought this one in 2014 with very low miles. since i like fast; dependable; sharp looking cars that are fairly quiet and give good gas mileage; i modified this car as follows:#- roush 710 corvette killer kit installed by brenspeed. fuel upgrades; etc. roush 2300 tvs supercharger. intercooled. runs about 10psi. 93 octane.#- carbon fiber driveshaft can handle more hp than this car makes. lighter and safer. on top of that i still installed a bmr driveshaft safety loop. dont really need it with a cf ds; though.#- exedy clutch kit; pressure plate; etc. 5;000 miles on this set up. i wanted to make sure the power would not cause the clutch to slip. not too stiff; maybe 20% more than stock. the orig did not slip; but as insurance i did the upgrade.#-  the nitto drag radials have low miles on them with drift wheels. they are in excellent shape without scratches; etc. also a set of nearly new wheels and tires on pirelli all seasons 245/275s for driving in cooler temps for an additional $1;000#- tokico d-spec adjustable shocks/struts with ford racing p springs. from full soft to full firm. adjustable with hex key chain. 2 sets of ignition keys. set rears to moderately firm and fronts to full soft for drag racing. firm front; moderate firm rear for handling on curves;etc. set to moderately soft for longer trips and ride comfort.#- ford racing front lower control arms with ford racing ball joints.#- bmr watts link with poly ends. this just came out last year from bmr. allows flat handling without the hard ride.#- whiteline rear lower control arms. less flex without a lot of nvh.#- lower control arm relocation brackets. eliminates all wheel hop. makes the tire bite the road surface for both sport driving or drag racing.#- boss 302 oil cooler. preventative maintennance.#- gt 500 axle back exhaust. no drone. excellent sound.#- the car dynos at 590 rwhp; 490 rwtq on 93 octane.#- i turned 11.80s at the dragstrip with the street pirellis. never power shifted. a lot of torque.#- gauge pods with aeroforce interceptor. mechanical boost. oil temperature gauge. the oil temperature gauge is the most important gauge in any engine because high oil temps can alert you to engine issues. oil changed every 2;000 miles with 5-20 mobil one.#- axle and transmission fluids changed with mobil 1.#- orig brakes have more than 1/2 surface left. no pulsating or noises.#- i am sure there are more things im forgetting.#- i have about $15;000 in the car plus the cost of the vehicle.#the car is very fast; quiet. shifts excellent. braking is very good. steering is tight. i do believe there are no rattles or squeaks. excellent gas mileage. needs nothing.

TITLE: 2014 mustang gt cpo warranty
ATTR: condition: excellent#fuel: gas#odometer: 44000#title status: clean#transmission: manual
MESSAGE: i have for sale a 2014 ford mustang gt 5.0.  it is a six speed manual transmission and is mechanically bone stock.  it is in great shape inside and out with 44;000 miles and without any significant wear items to note.  it has been driven so it isnt in show room condition at this point.  i also installed a full coilover suspension to upgrade the handling and a staggered wheel fitment at 42;000 miles so all of that only has 2;000 miles on it.  the wheels are 20x9 in the front with 255 sumitomo htrs on the front and 20x10s with 285 sumitomo htrs in the rear.  the care looks amazing and handles as such.  with the aftermarket wheels i didnt get the tpms monitor transferred over but do have them with the stock wheels which will come with the car.  they just need to be transferred to the new wheels.  as such; the tpms like comes on occasionally since there are no sensors to detect.  i have already gone through the trouble of making sure these wheels will accept the stock tpms sensor; and they will.  the hood; top; and decklid are plastidipped splatter black.  i though it looked cool and set the car apart.  if you dont like it plastidip makes a dip remover spray for $15 and it will easily come off.  the car recently had a body control module replaced by ruther ford in festus; mo under warrranty along with the clutch cable which was leaking onto the bcm and thus fried it.  i also have a continued transferable warranty through fords certified pre-owned program that will come with the car.  i am unsure of the transferring process but as i understand it is very simple.  it is a 4 year/48;000 bumper to bumper and extended 7 year/100;000 mile powertrain.#no joy rides.  no test rides without proof of financing.  this is a serious car and not a toy to mess around with.  the title has a lien through century credit union in southy county.  i still owe on it and the price is marginally negotiable.  i have all of my service records for this car.  bommarito ford didnt have any additional to give me.  i am selling because this car currently doesnt fit my lifestyle as my wife and i just moved to the country and have a kiddo on the way; otherwise trust me; this car would not be for sale.#this car has an nada value with the warranty of 24;500 without any of the upgrades.#name is andrew.  text anytime at six three six - 222 - three five zero nine.  thanks for reading my ad.
